# GAM

[![](image/01_tweet.png)](https://twitter.com/ucfagls/status/842444686513991680)

## Введение
### Полиномы

```{r}
set.seed(42)
poly_2 <- tibble(x = 1:100,
                 y = x + x^2+rnorm(100, sd = 1000))

poly_2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x, y))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE)

poly_2_fit1 <- lm(y ~ poly(x, 2, raw = TRUE), data = poly_2)
poly_2_fit2 <- lm(y ~ x+I(x^2), data = poly_2)

summary(poly_2_fit1)
summary(poly_2_fit2)

poly_2_fit2_values <- tibble(x = poly_2$x,
                             fit = poly_2_fit2$fitted.values)

poly_2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x, y))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(data = poly_2_fit2_values, aes(x = x, y = fit), color = "blue")
```

### Сплайны

```{r}
poly_2_fit2 <- lm(y ~ bs(x), data = poly_2)
poly_2_fit2_values <- tibble(x = poly_2$x,
                             fit = poly_2_fit2$fitted.values)

poly_2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x, y))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(data = poly_2_fit2_values, aes(x = x, y = fit), color = "blue")
```


## GAM

```{r}
poly_2_fit3 <- gam(y ~ s(x), data = poly_2)
summary(poly_2_fit3)

fitted <- tibble(x = poly_2$x,
                 fit = poly_2_fit3$fitted.values)

poly_2 %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x, y))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line(data = fitted, aes(x = x, y = fit), color = "blue")
```
